DeadByBuglight, DeadbyLag (awesome dedicated servers, "we did a pretty good job"), DeadByFPSDrops and i need a NASA computer in order to run the game at 60 fps for more than 5 minutes . The game is shit just because of these 3 things, everything else is nice and fun.

A little Update (22/06/2020)
The game still shi1t FPS drops came back with the last chapter of the game (even though my laptops fill the recomended requeriments for every single aspect), and fake hits through palletes, 1 meter from windows, no working Dead Hard, all that bullsh1t still a thing. Bugs like stuck under the hook or stuck anywhere are there too, AND THE GAME IS CELEBRATING ITS 4th ANNIVERSARY, FOR GOD'S SAKE OPTIMIZE AND FIX THE GAME ALREADY.

The worst part is that I'm still playing this golden garbage.

Dead by Daylight, is in my opinion, a game where most of your motivation and pleasure comes from Spiting the opponent. Whether it's the slightly hysteric glee of saving your fellow survivor from the hook and tanking a blow from the Killer to help both of you to escape, or the sadistic, vindictive glee of slaughtering the little worms who thought that their arrogance would go unpunished, the game is very emotional. This emotion becomes very apparent when the opponent doesn't want to allow you to have fun, abusing overly powerful perks or abilities or just playing like nothing is sacred to them. Yet i still return to this game. The game has it's issues, sure, but this game can honestly be very fun. The only question is, do you have the patience to grind to the fun part.

Знаете в этой игре можно надолго ЗАВИСНУТЬ.(свист ХА) А вообще годная игра, всем советую, симулятор пикника возле повешенного и сумасшедшего ремонта движков от старых развалюх( судя по скорости их заводки это явно Жегуль или Чепырка) 12 духов в каждой катке подряд из 10 Клодетток, которых не заметили в кустах, (я не расист)
P.S Кемперы- это когда маньяк сторожит повешенного, а Ген-раш - это когда выжившие делают свою цель, чинят генераторы.

This game is awesome! It's getting new content and updates every once in a while and it keeps you motivated to keep playing and not get bored. you'll find all kind of players here as in many games like this. Some that you'll love to play with/against and some that you'll hate. I highly recommend it.

만약에 이 게임이 무섭다고 생각된다, 하지만 친구들이 하자고 하면
1. 스트리머들(살***회장, 맥*마* 등)의 영상을 보자. 단, 이 분들은 최소 3k 시간 이상은 묵은 고인물들이니 무턱대고 따라하려고 하진 말자.
2. 생존자가 무섭다면 살인마를 해보라. 플레이 중에 '나라면 이렇게 했을텐데' 라는 생각이 들기 시작하면 생존자를 시작해도 좋다.
3. 생존자의 퍽 티칭은 클로뎃 -> 탭 형사(쏘우 dlc를 샀다면) -> 매그 -> 케이트(클라운 dlc 미구매시 패스) -> 데이비드/니아 -> 빌 루트를 추천한다. 이정도만 쌓아도 60시간은 충분히 넘긴다.
당신이 살인마에게 판자를 내리치고 칼찌를 꽂는 재미를 알아갈수록, 이 게임의 재미는 가면 갈 수록 올라갈 것이다.
